70-9	11321-11325	only	_

70-11	11330-11342	distribution	_
70-12	11343-11347	from	_
70-13	11348-11353	which	_
70-14	11354-11357	the	_
70-15	11358-11365	sources	_
70-16	11366-11367	,	_
70-17	11368-11369	s	_

70-20	11374-11375	]	_
70-21	11376-11377	,	_

70-23	11382-11387	drawn	_
70-24	11388-11389	.	_

71-1	11390-11392	In	_
71-2	11393-11396	the	_
71-3	11397-11402	first	_
71-4	11403-11407	case	_
71-5	11408-11409	,	_

71-8	11422-11429	sources	_
71-9	11430-11435	drawn	_
71-10	11436-11440	from	_
71-11	11441-11442	a	_
71-12	11443-11447	zero	_
71-13	11448-11452	mean	_
71-14	11453-11461	Gaussian	_
71-15	11462-11474	distribution	_

71-18	11483-11489	aligns	_
71-19	11490-11494	with	_
71-20	11495-11498	the	_
71-21	11499-11503	form	_

71-23	11514-11518	used	_

71-26	11526-11537	derivations	_

73-1	11669-11673	Such	_

73-18	11780-11782	is	_
73-19	11783-11784	a	_
73-20	11785-11795	difference	_

73-30	11856-11863	subject	_
